original_text: Also thou shalt not oppress a stranger: for ye know the heart of a stranger, seeing ye were strangers in the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 너는 이방 나그네를 압제하지 말라 너희가 애굽 땅에서 나그네 되었었은즉 나그네의 사정을 아느니라

sentences.original_text: Also thou shalt not oppress a stranger
for ye know the heart of a stranger
seeing ye were strangers in the land of Egypt
